film.title: Hudson Hawk
film.summary: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

guestOne.name: Emily V. Gordon
guestOne.bio: Emily Gordon is a gamer, writer, relationship counselor, and co-host of the Nerdist podcast The Indoor Kids. She has written for Bust Magazine, Jane Magazine, Dame Magazine, and probably other four-letter-word-about-women magazines.

results.episodeDescription: Emily Gordon of The Indoor Kids joins Paul, June, and Jason to discuss Bruce Willisâ€™ cappuccino obsession, Nintendo references, and burglary duets in Hudson Hawk. They cover everything from the candy bar named bad guys to Andie MacDowell being Nundercover.
